# Rename

This Gem allows you to rename a Rails3 application by using a single command.


## Installation

Add this line to your application's Gemfile:

<pre><code>gem 'rename'</code></pre>


## Usage

<pre><code>rails g rename:app_to New-Name
</code></pre>
